def_cn: （人）值得尊敬的，正直的;（行为）光荣的，体面的
def_en: If you describe people or actions as honourable, you mean that they are good and deserve to be respected and admired.

def_cn: （用于某些贵族和法官等官员名字前的尊称）尊敬的，阁下
def_en: Honourable is used as a title before the names of some members of the nobility, judges, and some other officials.

def_cn: （英国议会辩论时议员彼此间的尊称）尊敬的，阁下
def_en: In debates in the British parliament, one member of parliament refers to another as the honourable member, the honourable gentleman, the honourable lady, or their honourable friend.
